rules: Rule1: If the agricultural company uses the platform, then the agricultural company is profitable.
Rule2: Provided that the researcher submits the paper, the journal accepts the paper.
Rule3: Under the condition that the journal accepts the paper, the platform does not control irrigation.
Rule4: In the case that the project succeeds in yield, if the agricultural company is not profitable, then the project does not fail due to drought.
Rule5: If the farmer adopts the platform, the agricultural company is profitable.
Rule6: The farmer adopts the platform or the farmer licenses the platform.

Rule7: If the company upgrades the platform, then either the company modifies the platform or, on the condition that licensing the platform does not imply the agricultural company's profitability, the farmer sues the company.
Rule8: Whenever the platform uses AI, the AI optimizes irrigation.
Rule9: If the AI optimizes irrigation, then the AI wastes water.
Rule10: Provided that the AI optimizes irrigation, the AI does not waste water.
Rule11: The platform complies with regulations or the platform violates regulations.
Rule12: Under the condition that the platform violates regulations, either the platform monitors sensors or the platform does not control irrigation.
Rule13: If the platform is investigated by the agency, then the platform is not fined by the agency.
Rule14: Provided that the platform is audited by the agency, the platform is investigated by the agency.
Rule15: If the company shares the data, then the company publishes the results.
Rule16: The company shares the data or the company collaborates with the university.
Rule17: Provided that the company collaborates with the university, the company patents the technology.
Rule18: If the company patents the technology, then the project succeeds in yield.

Rule19: If the company guarantees performance, then if it is not the case that the platform's failure due to drought implies the project does not fail due to drought, the company compensates the farmers.
Rule20: If the consultant recommends the platform, then if the farmer licenses the platform, the agricultural company is profitable.
Rule21: Provided that the farmer hires the consultant, the consultant recommends the platform.
Rule22: If the regulator approves the platform, then if the venture capital firm invests in the project, the venture capital firm funds the project.
Rule23: The regulator approves the platform or the regulator reviews the platform.
Rule24: Provided that the regulator reviews the platform, if the venture capital firm invests in the project, the venture capital firm funds the project.
Rule25: The platform controls irrigation or the agricultural company is profitable.
Rule26: Under the condition that the researcher publishes the paper, the platform monitors sensors.
Rule27: The researcher publishes the paper or the researcher submits the paper.
Rule28: If it is not the case that either the project fails due to funding or the project succeeds in yield, then the company terminates the project.
Rule29: If it is not the case that complying with regulations implies either monitoring sensors or not controlling irrigation, then the platform is fined by the agency.
Rule30: Provided that it is not the case that complying with regulations implies either monitoring sensors or not controlling irrigation, the platform is audited by the agency.

Rule31: If it is not the case that the negation of the statement 'if the agricultural company does not use the platform, then it develops the platform' implies that the venture capital firm funds the project, then the platform uses AI.
Rule32: Provided that it is not the case that the agricultural company uses the platform implies the agricultural company develops the platform, the venture capital firm invests in the project.

Rule33: Under the condition that it is not the case that the agricultural company uses the platform implies the agricultural company develops the platform, the venture capital firm does not fund the project.
Rule34: If the agricultural company does not use the platform, then the agricultural company does not develop the platform.
Rule35: Provided that the agricultural company is not profitable, the project fails due to drought.
Rule36: If the agricultural company is not profitable, then the platform fails due to drought.
facts: Fact1: The company upgrades the platform.
Fact3: The farmer hires the consultant.
Fact4: It is not the case that the project fails due to funding.
Fact5: The company does not terminate the project.
Fact6: The farmer does not sue the company.
Fact7: The company does not modify the platform.
Fact8: The company does not publish the results.
Fact9: The company does not compensate the farmers.
Fact10: The platform does not monitor sensors.
